allow: Bash(.venvScriptspython -c "from app.services.topology_service import build_topology_graph; from app.database import SessionLocal; db = SessionLocal\(\); result = build_topology_graph\(db\); print\(''Nodes:'', len\(result[''nodes'']\)\); print\(''Edges:'', len\(result[''edges'']\)\); db.close\(\)")

Bash(.venvScriptspython.exe -c "from app.schemas.topology import TopologyEdge; edge = TopologyEdge\(**{''id'': ''test'', ''from'': ''src'', ''to'': ''dst'', ''label'': ''test''}\); print\(''Schema validation successful''\); print\(f''Edge from_: {edge.from_}''\)")
Bash(timeout 5 bash -c 'while ! curl -s http://localhost:8000/docs > /dev/null 2>&1; do sleep 1; done; echo ""Server is running!""')
